fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Accidentally modconfirm a target. If they are an evil, they will be granted Lynch Immunity for the rest of the game. If they are good, you will deal a Basic Attack to them.
-Before the game starts, you may.choose up to 2 slots in the rolelist to change to anything else. Nobody will know except for you and the host.
-Become a Prodigy (18) during the night
-Become a Progeny (673) during the night.
-Grant yourself Invincible defense during the night. 0 uses. 1 use If at least one person voted to @ban you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Yall viri Will viriKill llme viriIf Will ill viriKille riKill lill lll l llme
-You may NOT win with witcheswitches
-You may NOT win (get) with (any) bitchesbitches
-At any point during the game, a player night decide to vote to @ban you. If at least half the players vote to, you get @null and die.
-You appear as WereLion to Consigliere and Potion Master
-You get dealt an Unstoppable Attack at the end of night 5 due to no water.
